Container.Name: Gameyfin
Container.Overview: Manage your video games. Gameyfin turns your video game files into a beautiful webpage. Everything is stored locally (except videos) so its LAN-friendly as well!

Config.Name: App Key
Config.Description: 16, 24 or 32 byte long Base64 encoded string, which can be generated using the following command: openssl rand -base64 32

Config.Name: App URL
Config.Description: Set this if you are using Gameyfin with a reverse proxy

Config.Name: User ID
Config.Description: Set this if you want to run Gameyfin with a specific user ID

Config.Name: Group ID
Config.Description: Set this if you want to run Gameyfin with a specific group ID

Config.Name: Gameyfin Web UI
Config.Description: Port for Gameyfins web UI (if you do not use a reverse proxy)

Config.Name: Tracker port for Torrent plugin
Config.Description: Set this if you plan to use the Torrent plugin

Config.Name: Seed client port for Torrent plugin
Config.Description: Set this if you plan to use the Torrent plugin

Config.Name: Video game library
Config.Description: Add as many video game files as you want

Config.Name: Database Directory
Config.Description: Where Gameyfins database will be stored

Config.Name: Data Directory
Config.Description: Where Gameyfins media (images) will be stored

Config.Name: Logs Directory
Config.Description: Where Gameyfins logs will be stored
